title: 50/50 Grid
description: Group that uses CSS Grid to force children into 50% width

styles.css: & {display: grid !important;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill, minmax(min(max(400px, 50vw), 100%), 1fr));} & > .wp-block-group { display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center } & > *+* { margin-top: 0 !important; } &.block-editor-block-list__block { grid-template-columns: 50% 50% !important; }
